column4: clearscreen:do you know where to find sound booster in ubuntu 8.10 ?
what for do you need a soundboost?
my microphone recording sound volume is too low, I have laptop DELL XPS 1530, looked all around the internet but didn't find solution. I was suggested to check soundbooster option in alsamixer
oh :-/, good luck ;)
using ALSA?
yes you are, I didn't see it :D
hmm, I have a mic boost in my alsa mixer, you checked it?
what version of ubuntu are you using?
intrepid
you?
the same. that's strange I can't find it in alsamixer itself or volume control options
Volume Applet 2.24.1
you went to preferencies and checked the box for the Boost?
what do you mean by Volume Applet 2.24.1? and there is no boost box in preferencies
I have that version...hmm...strange you don't have it...then it's maybe soundcard dependent...
I know more people with the same problem and different laptop, the same on ASUS laptop
yes, it's soundcard dependent, I switch it to other, and I don't have a boost anymore... :-/
I had a boost option in ubuntu 8.04, but not in 8.10, any ideas how to solve it?
oh! crap...i dunno...
hmm...I'm just guessing, but maybe compiling the driver with boost support if it's possible..
but that'd be the last resort...
